hero.title: Join the Future of Livestream Entertainment
hero.subtitle: Become a host or agent on top livestreaming platforms. Earn money through gifts, missions, and commissions. Get support from our marketing tools and experienced team.

howItWorks.title: How Skuids Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple ways to earn with Skuids

steps.title: Register as Host or Agent
steps.description: Choose your path: become a host and earn from live streaming, or become an agent and recruit hosts while earning commissions.

steps.title: Join Your Platform
steps.description: Pick from multiple platforms like Chamet or Poppo. Each platform offers different earning opportunities and mission rewards.

steps.title: Start Earning
steps.description: Hosts earn from viewer gifts and completing missions. Agents earn commissions from their recruited hosts and access to marketing tools.

features.title: Why Choose Skuids?
features.description: Everything you need to succeed in livestream entertainment
features.content: Skuids is more than just a recruitment platform. We provide comprehensive support, advanced marketing tools, and genuine earning opportunities for both hosts and agents. Our platform connects you with top livestreaming services globally.

agentBenefits.title: Marketing Tools Suite
agentBenefits.description: Access professional marketing tools to easily recruit and manage hosts. Track performance, manage payouts, and scale your team.

agentBenefits.title: Competitive Commissions
agentBenefits.description: Earn generous commissions from your recruited hosts' earnings. Commission rates vary by platform and performance.

agentBenefits.title: Expert Support
agentBenefits.description: Get dedicated support from our experienced team. Training, strategy advice, and technical assistance available 24/7.

agentBenefits.title: Mission Bonuses
agentBenefits.description: Earn additional income through special missions and bonuses. Incentives reset regularly with new opportunities.

hostBenefits.title: Earn from Gifts
hostBenefits.description: Viewers send you virtual gifts during live streams. Convert gifts to real money at competitive rates.

hostBenefits.title: Daily Missions
hostBenefits.description: Complete daily missions to earn bonus rewards. Missions vary by platform and offer steady additional income.

hostBenefits.title: Multi-Platform Access
hostBenefits.description: Stream on multiple platforms simultaneously. Expand your audience and multiply your earning potential.

hostBenefits.title: Professional Guidance
hostBenefits.description: Get tips and strategies from experienced hosts. Learn how to maximize earnings and build a loyal audience.

platforms.name: Chamet
platforms.description: Leading livestream platform in Southeast Asia with millions of daily active users. Earn from viewer gifts and exclusive missions.

platforms.name: Poppo
platforms.description: Global livestreaming platform connecting creators with audiences worldwide. Multiple earning streams and flexible schedule.

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.quote: I started as a host 6 months ago and I'm now making more than my previous job. Skuids team was incredibly supportive throughout my journey.

testimonials.name: Ravi K.
testimonials.quote: As an agent, I've built a team of 25 hosts. The marketing tools Skuids provides made recruitment easy and efficient.

testimonials.name: Jessica L.
testimonials.quote: The mission rewards are consistent and fair. I love the flexibility to stream when I want and earn on my own terms.

about.title: About Skuids
about.description: Skuids is a leading livestream recruitment and talent platform connecting talented hosts and agents with top-tier livestreaming platforms globally. We provide the tools, support, and community needed for success in the livestream entertainment industry.
about.mission: Our mission is to democratize livestream entertainment earnings, making it accessible to anyone with talent and dedication.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have questions? Want to join Skuids? Our team is here to help you get started on your path to earning.
